model

Class Piece

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Piece
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Door, Empty, Item, Player, Wall

    public abstract class Piece
extends Object
    This class represents the abstract notation of a Piece that is placed in the Game
    Author:
    Harman (singhharm1)

    • Field Summary

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Piece(Position position, String name, String description, Direction direction)
      Constructor: Takes in the position of where the Piece is to be placed in the game and the name and a description of the Piece also takes in a Direction parameter that determines the initial direction of the piece.

      • setLocation

        public void setLocation(Location loc)
        Set the current location of the piece inside the room it is currently in. This method is ideally used when a piece is moved within the same room. For moving a piece to a different room, setPosition(Position position) should be used.
        Parameters:
        loc -
